name: Load Promos Philippines (Sim Toolkit)
description: Load Promos Philippines is a tool that helps you to register your favorite load promos, check your remaining balance, share your load easily, and able to identify mobile prefixes easily. It is well-organized and can be use offline or online  Available only in the Philippines!  Features:  Supports dual sim.  Can save your likes anytime, anywhere.  Can use offline or online.  Can track of all the users likes  Fully Responsive  Can register your promo in two (2) different ways  Check Balance Inquiry   Easy Load Sharing   Easy Check what mobile network   Source of the promos  Date Added  Facebook Comments  Status for every promo  Notifications (BETA)  Show All Function (NEW)  Trusted Source(NEW)  Supported Cellular Networks: - Globe - Touch Mobile (TM) - Smart - Talk N Text (TNT) - Sun - Cherry Mobile   Reminders: We dont offer free load. This app is just a tool that helps you to register your favorite load promos easily and more. Thankyou!  Facebook Fanpage: https://www.facebook.com/Load-Promos-Philippines-264645707438550/  Telegram Group Chat: https://t.me/LoadPromosPH_Chat  Thanks to: Kuya Boie Sir Ceballos Kuya PJ
